com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.camera

Class CameraModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.camera.CameraModel

  • public class CameraModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the camera and it's view. It also allows a user to project a point given this camera's view. This file was adapted from Mixare
    Author:
    Daniele Gobbetti , Justin Wetherell

        height - Height of the model.
        init - Should initialize the internal transform and lco objects.

      • projectPoint

        public void projectPoint(Vector orgPoint,
                Vector prjPoint,
                float addX,
                float addY)
        Project point from the origin Vector to the projected Vector.
        Parameters:
        orgPoint - Vector representing the origin.
        prjPoint - Vector representing the projected point.
        addX - Add X to the projected point.
        addY - Add Y to the projected point.
